Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Alex Y. Aaron D. represents the person who is playing the game.

        public void fireWeapon(int targetX,
                       int targetY)
        Fires the gun that the player has at where the mouse is pointed.
        Parameters:
        targetX - X coordinate of where the bullet is supposed to be fired
        targetY - Y coordinate of where the bullet is supposed to be fired

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getHealth

        public double getHealth()
        Returns:
        The current health of the player

      • getDir

        public int getDir()
        Returns:
        The direction the player is facing as an int where 1 is Left, 2 is up, 3 is Right, 4 is Down

      • setVelocity

        public void setVelocity(double xVel,
                        double yVel)
        sets the velocity of the player, and changes the direction it is facing.
        Parameters:
        xVel - the xVelocity of the player
        yVel - the yVelcoity of the player

      • act

        public void act()
        moves X and Y based on the velocity of the player and slows down the velocity by friction.
